cleaned_text: Skin Disorders Before receiving his license as an acupuncturist, Dr. Min Choi has practiced as a dermatologist in Beijing Tongrentang Hospital for a decade, treating numerous patients with some of the most challenging skin conditions. Based on Dr. Choi's experience, 80% of patients with skin disorders also suffer from depression, anxiety, insomnia, digestive and respiratory problems as well. Acupuncture & herbal therapy provide a natural alternative to alleviate the symptoms of dermatological issues by treating the root cause of the problem. Taking a non-steroidal, chemical-free approach to treat skin conditions, we offer a customized treatment varying according to each person's condition. Traditional Herbal Medicine is recommended as the primary treatment for skin problems; however, acupuncture may also be used as needed. Our non-steroidal treatment approach helps to maximize your immune system's ability to fight the disease and regain optimum health through a safe, natural healing process. Herbal medicine helps to resolve not only the skin condition but ultimately balance the whole body's function promoting healthy digestion, stable emotions and renewed vitality. List of common complaints: Eczema | Atopic dermatitis | | Lichen Planus | Dry Itchy Skin | and more.
